definition: poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with

sentences.english: He is one of the most talented and inventive drummers in modern music.
sentences.chinese: 他是现代音乐界最具天赋和创造力的鼓手之一。

sentences.english: Suso is such a gifted footballer and his technical ability is so good.
sentences.chinese: Suso的天赋无与伦比，技术能力超强。

sentences.english: All of this with only natural talent.
sentences.chinese: 所有这一切只在于他的自然天赋。

sentences.english: Is now a tier 4 talent and is a prerequisite for the new Master Demonologist talent.
sentences.chinese: 它现在是一个4级天赋，是新天赋恶魔掌握的前置。

sentences.english: Is now a tier 4 talent and is a prerequisite for the new Master Demonologist talent.
sentences.chinese: 它现在是一个4级天赋，是新天赋恶魔掌握的前置。

sentences.english: Is the eagle aware of its genius of flying?
sentences.chinese: 你心中的鹰是否意识到它的天赋异禀？

sentences.english: It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.
sentences.chinese: 它也比外表，天赋或技能更重要。

sentences.english: The Emperor is endowed with civil and martial virtues.
sentences.chinese: 这个皇帝天赋文武双全。

sentences.english: Improved Fire Blast now is a Tier 2 Talent. Up from Tier 1.
sentences.chinese: 强化火焰冲击由一阶天赋升为二阶天赋。

sentences.english: Improved Fire Blast now is a Tier 2 Talent. Up from Tier 1.
sentences.chinese: 强化火焰冲击由一阶天赋升为二阶天赋。

sentences.english: And a member of the Borodin belonged to one of the most talented composers.
sentences.chinese: 而成员之一的鲍罗丁属于最具天赋的一位作曲家。

sentences.english: Fan argued that the exam system stunts individual interests and talents.
sentences.chinese: 范谊认为，高考抹杀了学生的个性和天赋。

sentences.english: Class Abilities are available to all specs in the class. All warriors learn heroic strike for example.
sentences.chinese: 全天赋可学，例如所有战士都能学英勇打击。

sentences.english: Be thankful and be happy for the gifts you have.
sentences.chinese: 所以，为你所拥有的天赋高兴和感激吧。

sentences.english: You will be able to swap hotbar configurations at the same time you swap specs.
sentences.chinese: 切换天赋时，可以同时切换快捷栏设置。

sentences.english: Talent is merely success’s distant cousin.
sentences.chinese: 而天赋只是成功的远房外甥。

definition: personal strength/one's special ability or strong points
